title: FSX - FSAddon - Tongas Fjords X
description:
As requested, Tongass Fjords X.  Not my own, but from my collection. Precracked, easy one step install.

================================================================================

Tongass Fjords X is supported by the same team that brought you Misty Fjords and Tongass Fjords for FS2004, and it covers almost the same area as the previous Tongass Fjords.

It is fully compatible with Ultimate Terrain right from the start, and also with most other FSX titles for the region that have been released up till now, including the recent Orbx Pacific Fjords.

This is not only a landscape enhancement (mesh, roads, rivers, coastlines and textures) like some of the other products mentioned here, but it ALSO includes three highly detailed and realistic airfields and settlements in the region (Sitka, Wrangell and Petersburg), as well as 17 photo-areas, hand-placed autogen, moving AI traffic and special AI floatplane traffic!!

With Tongass Fjords X we bring you a whole new FS world in Alaska, 80,000 square kilometers of it !!! Nope, weÃ¢â‚¬â„¢re not exaggerating one little bit, as you will soon see after installing it. Tongass Fjords X really is what FSAddon.com Publishing is all aboutÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.. enhancing your immersion in the wonderful world of Flight Simulation.

Tongass Fjords X will give you the feeling of Ã¢â‚¬Ëœbeing thereÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ more than ANY other product currently on the market. Sure, sure, marketing speak, right!? We are convinced that you will agree with us after installing Tongass Fjords X and all its additional scenery and objects. All of the thousands of previous owners of Misty Fjords and Tongass Fjords will confirm and support this.

This is one of the rare FS add-ons that already had an active Ã¢â‚¬ËœfollowingÃ¢â‚¬â„¢ before even being published !!

=================================================================================

Enjoy.  As always, if you like it, buy it.  Support great developers!
